verses.verse: Blow <S%H8628><s%> ye the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and sound an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> in my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7264>tremble:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>cometh,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is nigh at <S%H7138>hand;<s%>

A <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and of <S%H653>gloominess,<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6051>clouds<s%> and of thick <S%H6205>darkness,<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains:<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and a <S%H6099>strong;<s%> there hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H4480>ever<s%> <S%H5769><s%> the <S%H3644>like,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall be any <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it, even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of many <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H1755><s%>

A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoureth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and <S%H310>behind<s%> them a <S%H3852>flame<s%> <S%H3857>burneth:<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> is as the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H310>behind<s%> them a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> and <S%H3808>nothing<s%> shall <S%H1961>escape<s%> <S%H6413><s%> them.
The <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of them is as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and as <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall they <S%H7323>run.<s%>

Like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H4818>chariots<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall they <S%H7540>leap,<s%> like the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H3851>flame<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H398>devoureth<s%> the <S%H7179>stubble,<s%> as a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> set in battle <S%H6186>array.<s%> <S%H4421><s%>
Before their <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be much <S%H2342>pained:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H6289>blackness.<s%>

They shall <S%H7323>run<s%> like mighty <S%H1368>men;<s%> they shall <S%H5927>climb<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> like <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war;<s%> and they shall <S%H1980>march<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> on his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5670>break<s%> their ranks: <S%H734><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1766>thrust<s%> <S%H251>another;<s%> they shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> every <S%H1397>one<s%> in his <S%H4546>path:<s%> and when they <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H1157>upon<s%> the <S%H7973>sword,<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H1214>wounded.<s%>

They shall run to and <S%H8264>fro<s%> in the <S%H5892>city;<s%> they shall <S%H7323>run<s%> upon the <S%H2346>wall,<s%> they shall climb <S%H5927>up<s%> upon the <S%H1004>houses;<s%> they shall enter <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H1157>at<s%> the <S%H2474>windows<s%> like a <S%H1590>thief.<s%>

The <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7264>quake<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them; the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H7493>tremble:<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall be <S%H6937>dark,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars<s%> shall <S%H622>withdraw<s%> their shining: <S%H5051><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H2428>army:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H4264>camp<s%> is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he is <S%H6099>strong<s%> that <S%H6213>executeth<s%> his <S%H1697>word:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>terrible;<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H3557>abide<s%> it?

Therefore <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> ye even <S%H5704>to<s%> me with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> and with <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and with mourning: <S%H4553><s%>

And <S%H7167>rend<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H408>not<s%> your <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>merciful,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> and <S%H5162>repenteth<s%> him <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> if he will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H5162>repent,<s%> and <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> him; even a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> and a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God?<s%>
Blow <S%H8628><s%> the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> a solemn assembly: <S%H6116><s%>

Gather <S%H622><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation,<s%> <S%H6908>assemble<s%> the <S%H2205>elders,<s%> <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H5768>children,<s%> and those that <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7699>breasts:<s%> let the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> of his <S%H4480>chamber,<s%> <S%H2315><s%> and the <S%H3618>bride<s%> out of her <S%H4480>closet.<s%> <S%H2646><s%>

Let the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and let them <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2347>Spare<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H5159>heritage<s%> to <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> that the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> should <S%H4910>rule<s%> over them: <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> should they <S%H559>say<s%> among the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is their <S%H430>God?<s%>
Then will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for his <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H2550>pity<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Yea, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H1715>corn,<s%> and <S%H8492>wine,<s%> and <S%H3323>oil,<s%> and ye shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> <S%H854>therewith:<s%> and I will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among the heathen: <S%H1471><s%>

But I will remove far <S%H7368>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you the <S%H6830>northern<s%> army, and will <S%H5080>drive<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6723>barren<s%> and <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and his hinder <S%H5490>part<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H314>utmost<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and his <S%H889>stink<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up,<s%> and his ill <S%H6709>savor<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> great <S%H1431>things.<s%>
Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> O <S%H127>land;<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> great <S%H1431>things.<s%>

Be not <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H408><s%> ye <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> do <S%H1876>spring,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5375>beareth<s%> her <S%H6529>fruit,<s%> the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> and the <S%H1612>vine<s%> do <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H2428>strength.<s%>

Be <S%H1523>glad<s%> then, ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the former <S%H4175>rain<s%> <S%H6666>moderately,<s%> and he will cause to come <S%H3381>down<s%> for you the <S%H1653>rain,<s%> the former <S%H4175>rain,<s%> and the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> month.
And the <S%H1637>floors<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1250>wheat,<s%> and the <S%H3342>fats<s%> shall <S%H7783>overflow<s%> with <S%H8492>wine<s%> and <S%H3323>oil.<s%>

And I will <S%H7999>restore<s%> to <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H697>locust<s%> hath <S%H398>eaten,<s%> the <S%H3218>cankerworm,<s%> and the <S%H2625>caterpillar,<s%> and the <S%H1501>palmerworm,<s%> my <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> among you.

And ye shall eat in <S%H398>plenty,<s%> <S%H398><s%> and be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H6381>wondrously<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you: and my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else:<s%> and my <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>afterward,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> that I will pour <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> your old <S%H2205>men<s%> shall <S%H2492>dream<s%> <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> your young <S%H970>men<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> visions: <S%H2384><s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8198>handmaids<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> will I pour <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>show<s%> <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H8490>pillars<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke.<s%>

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> into <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and the <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H4422>delivered:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6413>deliverance,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H559>said,<s%> and in the <S%H8300>remnant<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7121>call.<s%>
